articles.title: Factbox: Recent attacks on prominent figures in Latin America
articles.description: Argentina's Vice President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner on Thursday night survived an apparent assassination attempt after a gunman threatened her at near point-blank range and the gun failed to discharge.
articles.content:
A man wearing a pin depicting Argentine Vice President Cristina Fernandez stands outside her house after she was pointed at with a gun outside her home, in Buenos Aires, Argentina September 2, 2022. REUTERS/Agustin Marcarian

articles.title: Argentina soccer league suspends games after assassination attempt on VP
articles.description: The Argentinian Football Association said on Friday that it's suspended all soccer matches following the assassination attempt against Vice President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner.
articles.content:
A gunman attempted to shoot Argentina Vice President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner outside of her home in Buenos Aires on Thursday. Although the shooter pulled the trigger, the gun didn't go off. File Photo by Stefano Spaziani/UPI | License Photo

articles.title: Three people die of mystery pneumonia in Argentina, six others ill
articles.description: The first six patients started exhibiting symptoms between 18 and 23 August.
articles.content:
A THIRD PERSON has died this week in Argentina from a type of pneumonia of unknown origin, with the fatalities thus far limited to a single clinic, health authorities have said.

articles.title: Argentina's Mystery 'Pneumonia' of Unknown Origin: Known Viruses Ruled Out
articles.description: Virologist Connor Bamford told Newsweek that a cluster of cases in Tucumán is concerning as they appear to involve a "serious infection" that can be fatal.
articles.content:
Cases of a mysterious pneumonia of unknown origin that has killed three people have been reported in Argentina.
Experts are rapidly researching what could be causing it and have so far ruled out known viruses such as COVID-19.

articles.title: Argentina's VP Kirchner unharmed in point-blank attempted shooting
articles.description: Argentina's Vice President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner escaped unharmed on Thursday after a man fired a loaded gun at her that failed to go off inches from her head.
articles.content: Argentina's Vice President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner escaped unharmed on Thursday after a man fired a loaded gun at her that failed to go off inches from her head. The attack, which the economy minister called an assassination attempt, comes at ... [1988 chars]

articles.title: Argentine Vice President Survives Assassination Attempt When Gun Jams
articles.description: Argentina’s vice president survived an assassination attempt late Thursday after a gunman’s weapon jammed as he tried to shoot her at close range outside...
articles.content:
Argentina’s vice president survived an assassination attempt late Thursday after a gunman’s weapon jammed as he tried to shoot her at close range outside her home, the country's leader said.
